DOC.brief_summary: It is important to provide high quality palliative care to all patients with a non-curable and life-limiting condition. The Care Pathway for Primary Palliative Care (CPPPC) provides tools for health care professionals to help them delivering palliative care timely and accurately.This study investigates whether the implementation of the CPPPC really helps to improve patients' lifes.
DOC.brief_title: PROject - Supportive and Palliative Care and INnOvation - Antwerp (Pro-Spinoza)
